mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( GOODS_ID, SELLER_NO, CATEGORY_M, TITLE, STATUS, SELL_PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, P_EXPLAIN, ENROLL_DATE, LOVEIT, RETURN_PD, LOCATION_T, PRODUCT_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOODSID.NEXTVAL, #{sellerNo}, #{categoryM}, #{title}, DEFAULT, #{sellPrice}, DEFAULT, #{pExplain}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{returnPd}, #{locationT}, #{productStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_ID, SELLER_NO, CATEGORY_M, TITLE, STATUS, SELL_PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, P_EXPLAIN, ENROLL_DATE, LOVEIT, RETURN_PD, LOCATION_T, PRODUCT_STATUS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEMBER ON (SELLER_NO = USER_NO) WHERE STATUS = '판매중'
